title: shankaranArAyaNam
sahitya:
shankaranArAyANam bhajEham sadAshivam nArAyANadEshAkSi rAganutam


anupallavi

 shankaranArAyaNI priyakaram sAdhu janAvana santOSakaram


caraNam   shaila rAja pUjita padAmbujam shArddUla carmAmbarAdi dharam 
sUrya candrAgni nayanam tri-nayanam shuka shaunakAdi guruguha sEvitam 
kailAsa giri vihAram shankaram kapAla shUla mAlAdi dharam kAlaharam 
tripura haram kali kalmaSApaham kAmita phalada karam
